definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: It is sad that many Chinese tend to be at loggerheads with their fellow Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 令人遗憾的是许多老中常与自己同胞相斗。

sentences.english: Ethmoid sinusitis is frequently complicated in children by orbital cellulitis and abscess.
sentences.chinese: 筛窦炎在儿童中常并发眼眶蜂窝织炎及脓肿。

sentences.english: The child's work at school is about average.
Liquid samples of oil reservoirs collected for PVT analysis were often degassed.
sentences.chinese: 油藏流体PVT分析中常取得脱气的流体样品。

sentences.english: Lysophospholipids are often observed in plant lipid extracts .
sentences.chinese: 溶血磷脂在植物类脂提取物中常看到。

sentences.english: Biological fluidized bed (BFB) is one of the common technologies used in wastewater treatment.
sentences.chinese: 生物流化床技术是废水处理中常采用的生物技术之一。

sentences.english: Sometimes in my dreams I see my Granduncle smiling.
sentences.chinese: 梦中常看到舅爷爷的笑脸。

sentences.english: This is usually the situation on heating controls.
sentences.chinese: 这是热控制中常出现的情况。

sentences.english: The sea is often used in Bible imagery to symbolize the great mass of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 海在圣经中常被用为众多人类的意象象征。

sentences.english: ANOVA is an effective method used in mathematics statistics.
sentences.chinese: 方差分析是数理统计中常采用的一种方法。

sentences.english: Aromatic plants are often used in cooking.
sentences.chinese: 烹调中常使用芳香植物。

sentences.english: The instability of zero position found in the inclining experiment is also discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了倾斜试验中常出现的零位不稳定性。

sentences.english: In order to construct conveniciently, the wells group was often used to reduce the underground water level.
sentences.chinese: 工程中常采用井群来降低基坑的地下水位，以便施工。

sentences.english: Substitution box (S-box) is an important component in the block cipher.
sentences.chinese: 置换盒又称为S盒，是分组密码中常采用的重要部件。

sentences.english: Pipe wall electrostatic effect is often produced in the pipe of air-solid phase pneumatic conveying.
sentences.chinese: 气固两相流管道中常发生管壁静电效应。

definition: to make a general reference/to be used in a general sense
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
to use sth as a metaphor
to extend (the meaning of a word, an analogy etc)/derivation
people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
